00094 class EGS_TRACK_SCORING_EXPORT EGS_TrackScoring : public EGS_AusgabObject {
00095 
00096 public:
00097 
00098     EGS_TrackScoring(const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f = 0);
00099 
00100     ~EGS_TrackScoring();
00101 
00102     int processEvent(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) {
00103         if( m_score ) {
00104             if( !m_didScore ) {
00105                 m_didScore = true; ++m_nScore;
00106             }
00107             int np = app->Np;
00108             if( m_pts->isScoringParticle(np)) {
00109                 if (iarg == EGS_Application::AfterTransport)
00110                     m_pts->addVertex(np,new EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex(app->top_p.x,app->top_p.E));
00111                 else if( iarg != EGS_Application::BeforeTransport )
00112                     m_pts->stopScoringParticle(np);
00113             }
00114             else if( iarg == EGS_Application::BeforeTransport ) {
00115                 int q = app->top_p.q;
00116                 if( (q ==  0 && m_score_photons) ||
00117                     (q == -1 && m_score_electrons) ||
00118                     (q ==  1 && m_score_positrons) ) {
00119                     m_pts->startNewTrack(np);
00120                     m_pts->setCurrentParticleInfo(new EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo(q));
00121                     m_pts->addVertex(np,new EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex(app->top_p.x,app->top_p.E));
00122                 }
00123             }
00124         }
00125         return 0;
00126     };
00127 
00128     bool needsCall(EGS_Application::AusgabCall iarg) const { return true; };
00129 
00130     void setApplication(EGS_Application *App);
00131 
00132     void reportResults();
00133 
00134     void setCurrentCase(EGS_I64 ncase) {
00135         if( ncase != m_lastCase ) {
00136             m_lastCase = ncase; m_didScore = false;
00137         }
00138         if( ncase < m_start || ncase > m_stop ) m_score = false; else m_score = true;
00139     };
00140 
00141     void setScorePhotons(bool score)   { m_score_photons = score; };
00142     void setScoreElectrons(bool score) { m_score_electrons = score; };
00143     void setScorePositrons(bool score) { m_score_positrons = score; };
00144     void setFirstEvent(EGS_I64 first)  { m_start = first; };
00145     void setLastEvent(EGS_I64 last)    { m_stop = last; };
00146     void setBufferSize(int size)       { m_bufSize = size; };
00147     void setFileNameExtra(const string &extra) { m_fnExtra = extra; };
00148 
00149 protected:
00150 
00151     EGS_ParticleTrackContainer  *m_pts;               
00152 
00153     EGS_I64                     m_start;              
00154     EGS_I64                     m_stop;               
00155     EGS_I64                     m_lastCase;           
00156     EGS_I64                     m_nScore;             
00157 
00158     int                         m_bufSize;            
00159 
00160     bool                        m_score;              
00161     bool                        m_didScore;           
00162 
00163     bool                        m_score_photons;      
00164     bool                        m_score_electrons;    
00165     bool                        m_score_positrons;    
00166 
00167     string                      m_fnExtra;            
00168 
00169 };
00170 
00171 #endif
